item.title: Jim Young interview on the Tom Kelly Real Estate Today radio show
item.description: Jim Young, president of PrecisionCraft Log & Timber Homes, speaks with Tom Kelly on his Real Estate Today radio show. They discuss the log home industry, timber frame homes, log home design, and timber frame elements.
item.itunes:author: PrecisionCraft Log and Timber Homes
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Young, president of PrecisionCraft Log & Timber Homes, speaks with Tom Kelly on his Real Estate Today radio show. They discuss the log home industry, timber frame homes, log home design, and timber frame elements.
item.itunes:summary: Jim Young, president of PrecisionCraft Log & Timber Homes, speaks with Tom Kelly on his Real Estate Today radio show. They discuss the log home industry, timber frame homes, log home design, and timber frame elements.
item.itunes:keywords: log homes, log home, timber home, timber frame, precisionCraft, tom kelly, log home design

item.title: Jim Young interview on the Green Building Journal
item.description: Jim Young, president of PrecisionCraft Log & Timber Homes, discusses the GREEN LOG Home and Lifestyle Awards.
item.itunes:author: PrecisionCraft Log and Timber Homes
item.itunes:subtitle: The GREEN LOG Home and Lifestyle Awards.
item.itunes:summary: Jim Young, president of PrecisionCraft Log & Timber Homes, discusses the GREEN LOG Home and Lifestyle Awards. A new program, who's purpose is to shine a spotlight on producers and sellers of innovative green building products and services.
item.itunes:keywords: green, building, green log, log homes, log home, timber home, timber frame, precisionCraft, Green Building Journal, log home design

item.title: Press Release for the GREEN LOG Home & Lifestyle Awards
item.description: Press Release for the GREEN LOG Home & Lifestyle Awards. The GREEN LOG Home & Lifestyle Awards were created in response to the growing demand for green building solutions, products, and information. The goal of the awards is to locate and shine a spotlight on those companies and individuals who are enabling healthier homes and lifestyles.
item.itunes:author: PrecisionCraft Log and Timber Homes
item.itunes:subtitle: The GREEN LOG Home & Lifestyle Awards were created to locate and shine a spotlight on those companies and individuals who are enabling healthier homes and lifestyles.
item.itunes:summary: Sponsors and awards founders announce the GREEN LOG Home & Lifestyle Awards. Categories, nominees and the program in general are discussed.
item.itunes:keywords: green, green log homes, log homes, log home, timber home, timber frame, PrecisionCraft, green log home awards
